consciousness_studies.name: Consciousness Studies
consciousness_studies.description: Deep understanding of sapience emergence, self-awareness, and the nature of consciousness. Required foundation for genetic uplift research.
consciousness_studies.discoveryMessage: We now understand what makes a mind sapient. The path to creating new conscious beings opens before us.
consciousness_studies.flavorText: The hard problem of consciousness has been solved. We know what thought is, and how it emerges.

genetic_engineering.name: Genetic Engineering
genetic_engineering.description: CRISPR-based gene editing allows precise modification of DNA. Enables selective breeding programs and neural enhancement for genetic uplift.
genetic_engineering.discoveryMessage: We can now rewrite the code of life itself. Genetic uplift programs can begin.
genetic_engineering.flavorText: Every genome is now editable. Evolution is no longer random.

neural_augmentation.name: Neural Augmentation
neural_augmentation.description: Direct modification of brain structure and neural pathways. Dramatically accelerates intelligence gain in uplift programs.
neural_augmentation.discoveryMessage: We can reshape minds as easily as clay. Intelligence itself is now engineerable.
neural_augmentation.flavorText: The brain is no longer fixed at birth. We can grow genius.

selective_breeding_protocols.name: Selective Breeding Protocols
selective_breeding_protocols.description: Optimized breeding selection based on academic research. Published papers on genetics provide generation time bonuses.
selective_breeding_protocols.discoveryMessage: Academic research guides our breeding programs. Every paper published accelerates progress.
selective_breeding_protocols.flavorText: Science builds on science. Knowledge compounds.

nano_gene_editing.name: Nano Gene Editing
nano_gene_editing.description: Atom-by-atom precision in DNA modification. Near-zero mutation risk, massive acceleration.
nano_gene_editing.discoveryMessage: We can edit DNA with atomic precision. Uplift is now nearly instantaneous.
nano_gene_editing.flavorText: Every nucleotide placed with absolute precision. Perfection in flesh.

uplift_consciousness_transfer.name: Uplift Consciousness Transfer
uplift_consciousness_transfer.description: Download language, knowledge, and skills directly into awakening minds. Skip learning phase entirely.
uplift_consciousness_transfer.discoveryMessage: We can pour knowledge into minds like water into a cup. Sapience emerges instantly.
uplift_consciousness_transfer.flavorText: Born knowing. The first words are not "I am" but "I understand."

mass_uplift_protocol.name: Mass Uplift Protocol
mass_uplift_protocol.description: Uplift entire species populations simultaneously. Reduce generations from 100+ to 3-5 through parallel processing.
mass_uplift_protocol.discoveryMessage: We can uplift an entire species in a single generation. The age of sapient diversity begins.
mass_uplift_protocol.flavorText: A thousand minds awaken as one. The Cambrian explosion of consciousness.

malfunction.description: Hive mind formation - all uplifted share one consciousness
